title: 2: The Husband's Secret
itunes:title: The Husband's Secret
description: In the first episode of The Readheads Book Club, the girls are recapping, discussing and rating The Husband's Secret by Liane Moriarty. They're discussing major themes in the story, answering some of the hard questions the book poses, and sharing their casting recommendations for a movie based on the book. Plus, they give the book their overall Readheads Book Club rating and share Becky's choice for next month's read. Enjoy! Follow @thereadheadsbookclub for more: https://www.instagram.com/thereadheadsbookclub/ The overall Readheads Rating for The Husband's Secret is 2.875 stars.
